Dedge is "Fun to play" But F#cking sucks to vs. For the love of god do something, anything to make it not cancer to play against.

It can be quite frustrating playing a game where you *can`t* win, only survive. But it`s also fun to spooky yourself and your friends playing together. I love the bloodweb as a way of upgrading characters skills, it reminds me of more traditional video games.  And when you find out a couple of your friends are better killers than survivors, at least you know they won`t banish you to an universe of escaping meat hooks and haunting crows in real life. 
TLDR:  Scary game, more fun with freinds, the moans sound weird at times, I hope you don`t have any heart problems when playing this. Have fun !
i love this game its so good
The game is fun, and could be better if the production team puts more effort into fixing bugs.
Appeals to the kind of people that always look like they have a layer of slime on their skin
Un gran juego pero es dificil jugar de asesino recomiendo jugar con amigos o preparate a enojarte mucho

I'm making this review to share my honest opinions on what might be the best game of all time, Dead By Daylight, I absolutely love this game, and I would LOVE to share my passion for it, I main the cannibal (bubba sawyer from the texas chainsaw massacre) MY FAVOURITE MOVIE CHARACTER!!!! Anyways, I also use dead hard and shit on every killer I meet! No one can beat me!! The only thing that pisses me off about this game is the fact that people dont SHUT THE FUCK UP!!! thank you for reading <3
fun if you like a challenge and can stay calm if things take a turn for the worst
one of the best games at the moment.
Nunca passei tanta raiva em um jogo! Super recomendo!
fun game, like it a lot
I really only play with friends. The best atmosphere does wonders. Get it and don't be a meanie.

BHVR only cares about making money, they do not care at all about the state of the game itself OR the community's opinion.

The game has a toxic community where people will cry and moan if killers don't play their way. The game is heavily unbalanced, you could outplay a survivor at every loop and end chases within seconds, but the gen speeds are far too quick that it doesn't even matter how good of a killer you are if survivors just sit on a gen all game. Pressure one survivor off a gen and the other 3 are back on gens and they're nearly all done within half a minute to a minute.

The devs don't listen to the community, they make changes that they think will help the game and when everyone says this isn't helping please change it back, they ignore the community and do it anyway.

They have lost a huge amount of the player base due to their decisions and lack of empathy for the community.

Spend your money on Evil Dead or just wait for Video Horror Society to come out, it will be free to play anyway.
pretty good when there are people playing

very good fun to kill people
:DDD
this game  is why i have anger issues

The only reason I would recommend this game is in a local/friend setting. Between matchmaking, excessive toxic behavior, and the fact that it's heavily geared toward the Killer's, half the time, your only chance of survival is sacrificing fellow survivors to get out alive. I feel no point in playing this game now when no matter what you do, you end up losing in online matches.
My most-played game on Steam. I can't say it's bad, right?
ta bueno, me tunelean por usar personajes facheros

Like any multiplayer game, really fun if you don't get tilted and can play with friends. Matchmaking has been a lot better, but the nature of the game means it'll always be a struggle to combat toxic behaviour from both sides. Would highly recommend if:
[  ] You like horror games
[  ] You want to play with friends
[  ] You like games with low skill entry (easy to get into) but with possibility for medium skill ceiling
I'll change my review once they put Morbius in the game. Its Morbin Time.

But only if you like pain. 
My first official 1000hr game on steam, ive not become a better human for it. 
Take from that what you will.

This game only gets worse as time goes on. All the complaints that you may read are all correct and valid. If you enjoy suffering with the problems and wasting your time grinding for something you think might eventually payoff in some sort of "fun" only to realize that that time will never actually come and you are far too deep and devoted now to pull entirely out and save your soul, then this game is for you. Otherwise, just turn back now and save yourself from becoming one of us.

I am not a fan of scary games, and I likely never will be. I am the kind of person who can barely play FNAF Security Breach because being chased terrifies me.

However, this game is not... truly "horror".

Yes, the killers CAN be scary (I'm sorry my beloved Trickster but you're hot, not scary), but remember they are just people. Players, just like you. There are definitely builds that can make you get "jumpscared" (there are no jumpscares, EXCEPT Sadako's jumpscare in the menu lobby, where she jumps at the player, so turn her around and keep an eye on her if you're looking at her stuff), but usually you get some idea of when danger's around. Heartbeat means the big baddie of the match is coming to wreck you, and a few killers are either stealthy boys or invis boys, so keep a good eye out. The jumpscares really are just. "oh sweet heck there's the killer", so it's up to you if you can handle that. I really cannot, at least not currently.

So no, I don't play survivor. But I don't think this means the game was a bad purchase.

It does have glitches (I've encountered laggy players who've teleported around a little, throug no fault of their own, as well as just. bad hitboxes around select items like cars), but nothing that fundamentally makes the game unplayable.

I am a "killer main", as the community calls it, and I've learned that the key to this game is just,, having a positive attitude. I haven't run into people who've been mean in chats, but I've had a couple of players who'll tease and taunt me in matches. And sure, it's a little annoying, but there will always be more matches. And if you need a break, take a break. Don't let other people ruin this game for you. There's always gonna be good players, and honestly sometimes it's really nice to just... let surviviors go when they've fought a good fight. I've done it plenty of times and it's honestly enjoyable to see how survivors react when they catch on that you're not trying to decimate them.

It's fun, and there's lots of opportunities to play what you want to play.

HOWEVER, DLC. And online shops. No lootboxes, which is good, but if you're someone who struggles witht he temptation of purchasing all DLC, think about it. Buy what you will USE, and only that. Don't buy every killer if you only want to play one or two, don't buy every survivor if you only want a couple. Maybe it helps a lot with getting perks, and if that's worth it, then go for it. But don't feel you HAVE to buy everything.

So not a perfect game, but it's fun, and REMEMBER to try and stay positive and spread some joy to your fellow players, even if sometimes they're meanies.
really good game lots of details
am anfang ein bisschen verwirrend aber umso mehr man spielt und yt videos anguckt wird es besser

"An unknown error has occurred." This entire game is an error. Probably the most braindead devs on the planet. I don't know why they even bother  with new perks, everyone on survivor and killer sides, run the same exact perks. After you play for a while, the game gets so boring, you lose all variety, its just blight, nurse, blight, nurse, with maybe a huntress here and there. MMR was a mistake, the whole community didn't want MMR, but the devs, as they tend to do, did not listen and put it in anyway. Thumbs down...but I still love this game, play it and you'll feel the same.
very good with friends and by yourself
add sex pls, survivors have bigg booty
needs maybe a better option for communications or pings in game but still enjoyable with friends.

Dead by daylight is a fun game and i certainly recommend it to play. But the things is. I feel like you dont get a fair chance playing as killer. every time that i play as killer i get in game  where i face players with a far higher survival level than my killers level. the survivors have perks i can't beat with my current level

also it feels like  i got stabbed in the back. because i see other survivors do stuff. and when iam survivor the game doesn't allow me to do same stuff  as the others while iam doing exactly the same thing. 

That is why lost the fun of playing this game because i get no fair chance as a killer and everythime i leave my PC frustrated so i stopped playing.

i got the feeling that there are a lot hackers in the game. And the developers are doing nothing about it. 

I would recommend this game to play with friends in custom match. but if playing alone i wouldn't recommend it

Imagina que divertido demorar cerca de 50% de um gerador sÃ³ pra ir de um lado ao outro do mapa, isso acontece muito em MMR alto, com players mais experientes e que sabem fazer uma chase durar o mÃ¡ximo que conseguirem com os recursos que tÃªm.
